title: Sparx Premium Women Cycling Skinsuit Padded Speedsuit Women One Piece Cycling Kit
features: ✅ These bike suit womens made from top quality Italian technical fabric developed for Triathlon Gear wicks moisture away & dries very quickly. Keeps you cool & comfortable.

It has no wings but an additional front cover area.
